description:
Qualifications

We’re seeking a collaborative individual with:

  • Expertise in efficiently organizing and coordinating diverse information, materials, and personnel to maximize productivity and minimize duplication of efforts.
  • Proven ability to prioritize tasks effectively, especially under heavy workloads, tight deadlines, and competing demands, ensuring timely completion of all assignments.
  • Strong verbal communication skills, with the ability to speak clearly and professionally to groups or individuals, using appropriate vocabulary and grammar to convey information effectively.
  • Ability to maintain efficiency and focus even in environments with frequent interruptions.
  • Capacity to remain calm and composed in situations requiring conflict resolution. Required
  • Proficient in writing clear, grammatically correct business correspondence, such as memos and emails.
  • Establish and maintain organized filing systems.
  • Skill in using word processing software to prepare professional correspondence and documents.
  • Ability to establish and maintain cooperative working relationships with colleagues and work effectively as part of a team.
  • Ability to type correspondence, reports, and other written materials quickly and accurately.
  • Proficient in accurately entering data into Excel spreadsheets with speed and precision
  • Competence in using a 10-key calculator efficiently
  • Ability to modify and adapt office procedures to meet changing operational needs.
